actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to suspend participation and to withhold payment of expenses with respect to any organ, commission, or other body of the United Nations which discriminatorily applies to any procedural rule or discriminatorily imposes any sanction.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to suspend participation and to withhold payment of expenses with respect to any organ, commission, or other body of the United Nations which discriminatorily applies any procedural rule or discriminatorily imposes any sanction.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to suspend participation and to withhold payment of expenses with respect to any organ, commission, or other body of the United Nations which discriminatorily applies to any procedural rule or discriminatorily imposes any sanction.
